en.INTERNET_DISCONNECTED:
We’re sorry, we can’t seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.ROOM_DESTROYED:
We’re sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.SOCKET_DISCONNECTED: We’re sorry, we’ve lost your connection to the Jackbox Games servers.
en.TIMEOUT:
We’re sorry, we can’t seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.USER_DISCONNECT: We’re sorry, the server has disconnected you. Please try again.
en.LOST_LICENSE: We’re sorry, we lost the license for this content!
en.STEAM_ERROR: We’re sorry, we couldn’t validate your Steam license.
en.TWITCH_PRIME_ERROR: We’re sorry, we couldn’t validate your Twitch license.
en.LOST_DLC: We’re sorry, the license for your DLC could not be found. Returning you to the menu...
en.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_1: V5 | Welcome to Trivia Beta Party! In this modded version of Trivia Murder Party 2 , you'll anwser trivia around Beta64, JJDB210, and Much More in order for a chance to survive the hands of a new but familiar host.
en.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_2: UNMODDED | This game is not modded and is apart of the base Jackbox Party Pack 6 Experience.
en.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_3: V1 | Hey All, Scott Here! Join me and Beta64 for a night of Ultra_Fans proportions!
en.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_4: UNMODDED | This game is not modded and is apart of the base Jackbox Party Pack 6 Experience.
en.INFO_DESCRIPTION_GAME_5: UNMODDED | This game is not modded and is apart of the base Jackbox Party Pack 6 Experience.
en.SETTINGS_FULL_SCREEN_DESCRIPTION: ON will make the game full-screen.
en.SETTINGS_VOLUME_DESCRIPTION: Make the game LOUD or QUIET.
en.HELP_LINE_1: Select and start a game using a controller.
en.HELP_LINE_2: Once you’ve reached the game lobby, get out your phone, tablet, or laptop.
en.HELP_LINE_3: Go to jackbox.tv on your device.
en.HELP_LINE_4: Enter the 4-letter room code shown on the TV screen, and your player name.
en.HELP_LINE_5: The first player to join the game lobby (the VIP) can start the game from their device once everyone is ready.
en.HELP_LINE_6: Enjoy with your friends, family, or complete strangers.
